1.content:
“Uggh, Where am I?” You groan to yourself as you put your hands over your throbbing head.
As you massage your painful head, your slowly open your eyes to see that you are on the ground on your back. In mere second, a giant shadow flies past your field of vision and you manage to pull yourself up out of reflex.
“Whoa, what was that? Jets this low? That can’t be right.” You tell yourself.
Before you can get your bearing right in this thick jungle that you are standing in, you hear a rustle from behind and you notice a cat… A Huge Cat. As its left paw lands next to you, you are knocked away by the thrush of the wind and you almost piss your pants. The cat didn’t manage to see you. Well, how the hell could it, when it was so big that one of its claw was three times as big as you! You barely manage to stop yourself from crying out, alerting the cat of your presence as it dashes away at a speed that looks as if a mountain was moving as fast as a train.
“What kind of bullshit dream is this?” You ask no one in particular. You try to remember how the hell you got to sleep, only to realise you have no clue what so ever. Dream or not, you just hope that the monster cat doesn’t come back to eat you or anything.
“Feels so real,” You comment as you touch the jungle-like environment, complete with mud tracks and forages that block the sunlight, “but I could sure use getting up.” Just then, you hear more rustling, but softer this time.
“So what if it’s a dream, I still don’t want to die or anything” You joke and hide behind some leaves. That’s when you are dumbstruck as your eyes are telling you that there’s a 6 foot long lizard scurrying away, looking for food. “Wow, this is some whacked up dream.” You can’t help but comment. “I guess Lizards can’t hear,” You say as the lizard moves off at an extremely fast rate.

“Anytime now.” You say whine at yourself as you slap your head few times, trying to shake off this weird dream. Before you finish trying to wake your self up from this dream, you hear a familiar sound from very far off distance.
*RING*RING*
You would know that sound from anywhere. It was definitely the sound of your school bell ringing, signifying start and end of periods or breaks. Only then do you realise what is happening…

“What The FUCK!” You scream out at top of your lungs. You have no clue how you have shrunk to size of a bug, but it wasn’t going to be very nice unless you found some help, quick!

Looking up at the sky, you could predict that it was now time for…

She unscrews the jar and turns it upside down to empty the filthy content out of it. With a quick whoosh, she loosens her grip on the tweezers, right over the lidless jar and you do flips in midair, landing on your head, at the bottom of the glass jar. You take in your surroundings and you realise how hopeless your situation is. Without Suzy’s help, there’s no way you can climb out of this prison that makes you cough, due to cigarette particles.
As you look up, you can only scream in horror as Suzy’s mouth is covering the whole of Jar’s entrance. She expands and shrinks her cheeks constantly and before you dodge it, she spits a large gunk of flam towards you. Next thing you know, you find yourself trapped in the jelly like substance that weighs down your arms and legs so that you can’t move, and only makes you sink deeper and deeper. You are so disgusted by this and pray to god that this is a dream, however Suzy isn’t done and another layer of flam lands on your face, resulting in a mouthful of it, down your throat.
“Hahaha, you pitiful piece of shit. That’s right! I’m your Goddess! Your wholly existence depends on me!” Suzy laughs out, drunken in power.
If you were normal size right about now, you wouldn’t mind giving Suzy a smack in the head, for putting you through this torture, although she probably doesn’t mean it…
You continue try to lift your arms out of the goo but all your brain’s processing is the strong taste of the flam, and the smell of cigarette that the flam you are trapped in, is giving off.
As you are too busy trying not to drown in your friend’s pathetic flam, Suzy has carried the jar to the bathroom, so that…
11312.title: You can't swim in this

113121.content:
Just when you thought things were bad, you notice she took her mouth away from the jar. Phew! But....why is she taking her pants off? This can't be good.

SPLOSH! A burst of piss comes down on you. Drowned out, you hear, "Burn, little insect, burn!" you can't breathe in the sizzling liquid1 You slowly drown in the piss. The phloem holds you in place, being sticky and all. your eyes burn and your lungs burst. Finally you pass out, drowned in a goth's piss.
113121.title: She can take a leak in the jar

choices: Gulps you down!
Toys with you by running you against her teeth and tongue!
113122.content:
Just before your chin hits the jelly-like flam, Suzy manages to pluck you out using her tweezers. You wonder if she had a change of heart, as she carefully washes you at the tap, in gentle water. However, you blame yourself, wondering if you have possibly jinxed yourself, as Suzy starts lifting you toward her open mouth, showing her yellow teeth and pierced tongue.
To you, as Suzy tosses you, like some kind of candy, onto her tongue, you can’t help but imagine her red tongue as an enormous bed with a metal pole in the middle, with yellow tiles on the roof and the floor as decoration. Next thing you notice is, that the smell of the jar or the flam is nothing compared to inside of Suzy’s mouth. The stench of cigarette’s so bad, that it makes your eyes water. Before you can think too much about the pain, Suzy…
113122.title: Mouth Play

choices: Suzy decides to spit you out… along with her pool of spit
Chew on you violently
1131222.content:
The wet and slippery surface that you’re on suddenly lifts and you lose your balance, only to end up sliding toward Suzy’s metal piercing. To your perspective, the piercing is twice your size, and seems like a statue of some kind. Before you know it, Suzy’s starts to enjoy you all by herself as she wraps your small body around her amazing tongue like a cobra, sucking on your salty taste. However, in your point of view, Suzy’s spit is getting in your eyes and mouth and it’s burning, as if her spit was an acid. Not only that, this makes you feel somewhat sick as your whole body is covered in this sticky liquid, from head to toe. Anyhow, the fact is, you are helpless as Suzy has tied you up with her tongue, and are at the mercy of Suzy’s mighty tongues.
What does Suzy decide to do?
1131222.title: Dinner, to be?

choices: Mel in the gym
Suzy in detention
Jess in drama lessons
Karen in the canteen
Liz in the locker room
12.content:
You look around frantically, in a few hours the whole field will be crammed with students!
"Shit!" you yell from the top of a flower. "Just 2 hours! I'll never make it! Fuck!" You slid down and desperately dashed for safety, panting swear words and dodging leaves and litter. Jumping, ducking, sliding to your goal.

For what seemed like years of never ending forest, you finally emerged on concrete. You stumble forward, dirt and grime covered you, mixed with blood from smashed glass. You lean heavily against a wall, gasping for air. "I... made it..." You gasped out, as you fell into a crack in the wall, completely unconscious.

You slowly open your eyes... your vision was blurred and you had a ringing sound in your ear. You shook it off and walked completely into the room, shielding your eyes from the light. When your eyes adjusted, what did you see?
12.title: One Period before Lunch! Gotta Find Help Quick!

info.brief_description: Care for a change of perspective?
info.description:
What happens when you are forced to look at your friends from a different “perspective”?

Characters:


You (Johnny) : 17 years of age.
5’9’
Your grades are decent, you love swimming in your swimming club and most of all, you got great friends. Not only that, you are young, free and ready to take on what the future has in store for you. Except… Ending up, shrinking down to size of a bug in the middle of school and being given the opportunity to reassess whether you’ve been making the right friends or not.
In this story, you will be going through an ordeal of journey where you will try to get your friends’ help on reversing this shrunken effect. However, the real question is, once you see the people you knew, from a different perspective. Could you possibly convince yourself to leave your future within their hands? Are they still trust worthy?

Mel:
17 Years Old.
5’8

Childhood friend of yours, all the way back since Grade school. Infact, you guys were introduced to each other as your parents were friends in college. Despite how much time you spend with her, there has never been any discussion of romantic approach to the relationship. She has blonde hair and has a very slim body as she has in the track team since junior high. She also loves playing soccer, but due to her dedication to the track team, she decided to join the soccer team as a reserve, just to play soccer when she is needed. She never had a boyfriend of her own, when she probably could’ve had a few by now. Odd, you always thought. Talking about odd, you could even say that she was quite twisted as it seemed like she doesn’t take a shower too regularly, which is evident from her body odour and the state of the room, every time you give her a visit. Even though you visit her every week and also tell her to start tidying up a bit, it never seems to get any better, if not worse. There’s clothing all over her room, her bedroom door doesn’t even close shut properly, and worst of all, there’s always the musky smell of feet that clings around in her room. It is truly amazing how he still hasn’t got used to the stink, even though he must’ve spent at least two or three hours in such a state every week for over five years. Anyhow, excluding her bad BO, 10 out of 10 as a friend. She loves wearing these old sneakers, which doesn’t help with her smell, and matching top and shorts track team uniform at school. At home, she sticks to Flip Flops and Tank top along with short pants that show off her strong smooth legs.

Jess:
16 Years Old.

5’4

Official Girlfriend. She’s quite petit but very sexy in her own ways. You’ve known her since start of high school and recently started to “date” officially. She gets along quite well with Mel, somehow. From what you can tell, they are quite different “beings”. Mel, the uncivilised and stinky cavewomen and Jess, the temptress with sexy body. Honestly, there isn’t a place that you can see that she hasn’t done something. She definitely shaves off all body hair. Well, the ones you can see. She paints her toenails hot pink, which you find pretty cute. Not only that, her fashion sense is overwhelming as you never seen her “repeat” an outfit before. From what you can tell, she is a bit of a perfectionist. All in all, you love her very much, and have been telling yourself that you are ready for the next step, with more than just goodnight kisses and regular phone calls. Just maybe…


Suzy:
17 Years Old.
5’10
A goth friend of yours. You first met her in a music class back in Sophomore. She’s into rock music and isn’t afraid to dress up to school in fishnet boots that go all the way up to her long and elegant knees. Just remembering now, there have been few instances where you’ve seen her torture some helpless insects. She would spit on them, put them on fire with her lighter, or squeeze the life out of them between her powerful fingers. Once, she claimed that she got a jar full of them and drowned them all in her piss. You didn’t doubt her for a second. You have only been to her house once but it was surprisingly very neat. Maybe it’s because you are always around Mel, who’s living in a pig sty. Suzy’s house smelled fresh and she didn’t like it when things were messy, apparently. Funny though, when you were at her house, you saw that she had the same boots on. When asked why, she replied as if she was offended somewhat.
“Cuz I can. Something wrong with that?” When you heard that, you wondered whether that’s her defence for killing those insects…

Side Characters:
Karen
Jess’s best friend. 6’1. Very tall. Plays Volleyball with Jess.

Liz
In the same swim club as Johnny. She likes flirting with him and made moves on him before, even though she knows about him and Jess. 5’7 and great figure due to her enthusiasm in swimming. Wears Thongs.


Rules:
New Characters can be Introduced (Only Female)
Proper use of Grammar and Spelling
Please no Chapters involving Cliché such as “I was the one who shrunk you!”
Let Johnny (You) remain unnoticed or recognised as a pitiful bug for some duration please.
No death of Characters except Johnny.
Stick to “You” POV please.

Good Luck and try not to get Eaten, Sat on, Stepped on, Toyed, Flicked Off, Jarred, Tortured, Spat on, Drowned, Humiliated or Used by your friends...
